entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as having features that are not yet fully developed, but are still recognizable as his. He has a waxy and distorted face, with permanently bloody whites of the eyes.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as Voldemort's former handsome appearance.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore shows no sign of surprise at Voldemort's visit.

relationships.description: Voldemort's current appearance is described as a transformation from his former handsome appearance as Tom Riddle.
Dumbledore is hosting Voldemort in his office.
